OrgName: Automotive Rentals, Inc. dba Automotive Resources International
activities:
ARI complies with the U.S. – E.U. Safe Harbor framework and the U.S. - Swiss Safe Harbor framework as set forth by the U.S. Department of Commerce regarding the collection, use, and retention of personal data from European Union member countries and Switzerland. ARI has certified that it adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles of notice, choice, onward transfer, security, data integrity, access, and enforcement.  

We may collect the following personal information:
•Contact Information such as name, email address, mailing address, phone number
•Social Security Number (or National Insurance Number) where applicable and necessary
•Driver's License Number
•Demographic information such as age, gender and zip code
•Unique Identifiers such as user name, account number, password

As is true of most Web sites, we automatically gather information about your computer such as your IP address, browser type, referring/exit pages, and operating system.

We use this information to:
•Establish and maintain your online account
•Respond to customer service requests
•Administer your account
•Respond to your questions and concerns

Users of our sites may also enter personal information about third party individuals. In some instances, this information is collected to conduct verification, and in others, this is used to create accounts for additional users.
